caption: Today I choose to be happy! Others may not like what I do; heck they probably don't even like me! But today I got offered the best opportunity for myself and nobody can take that away from me! Today I have realised who my true friends are; I have too many people in my life at the moment who only want to see me fail and that is not going to happen! I am proud of myself and my words to those people are that jealousy is a colour that looks good on nobody! @beaub it would be amazing if you could please congratulate me but if he doesn't see this that is okay because I'm in such a good mood, nothing could bring me down from cloud nine! #happy #proud
